DOC.brief_summary: The primary purpose study evaluate effect systematic identification genetic counseling referral rate bilateral salpingo-oophorectomy ( surgery remove fallopian tubes ovary ) woman mammograms Swedish Medical Center Seattle , WA .
DOC.brief_title: Prevention Ovarian Cancer Women Participating Mammography
DOC.criteria: Prior mammogram Swedish Medical Center Willing able provide inform consent , primary physician information , complete study questionnaire Must meet least ONE follow criterion : personal history breast cancer diagnose age 50 personal history bilateral breast cancer age 1 first degree relative breast cancer diagnose age 50 3 first second degree relative breast cancer age 2 second degree relative breast cancer diagnose age 50 A male relative breast cancer age Ashkenazi Jewish family history breast ovarian cancer 1 first second degree relative ovarian cancer AND 1 first second degree relative breast cancer age 2 first degree relative ovarian cancer 2 second degree relative ovarian cancer 1 first 1 second degree relative ovarian cancer . A first degree relative breast ovarian cancer ( 2 primary person ) Personal history positive genetic test result follow gene : BRCA1 , BRCA2 , HNPCC , P53 Family history positive genetic test result follow gene : BRCA1 , BRCA2 HNPCC Previous diagnosis ovarian cancer Prior bilateralsalpingo oophorectomy Had negative genetic test result know family genetic mutation
